The Math Club at College of Staten Island is a [student activities club](https://www.csi.cuny.edu/campus-life/student-involvement/clubs-organizations/start-club), registered with the Office of Student Life and funded by the student activity fee.

## Activities (2024-2025)

We are planning regular biweekly meetings, some on Tuesday club hours, some on Thursday club hours. We have plans to host faculty talks.
